summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Valentine's website. Successfully tested 4 out of 6 pages with beautiful animations and responsive design. Found critical overlay issue blocking normal user interactions and audio source problem.

critical_bugs.issue: Error overlay intercepts pointer events preventing normal button clicks
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot interact with buttons without force clicks
critical_bugs.error_message: iframe src='about:blank' id='webpack-dev-server-client-overlay' intercepts pointer events

critical_bugs.issue: Background music fails to load - 'The element has no supported sources'

ui_bugs.issue: Cannot complete full 6-page flow due to overlay blocking interactions
ui_bugs.workaround: force=True clicks work but not available to real users

integration_issues.issue: Music toggle button present but audio source broken
Confetti library not detected in browser environment

passed_tests: Page 1 (Welcome) loads with floating hearts animation
Page 2 (Questions) displays all 3 sequential questions correctly
Page 3 (Playful) shows hugs question with proper styling
Page 4 (Emotional) displays night sky gradient and stars animation
All data-testid attributes present for interactive elements
Proper font families (Fredoka, Nunito, Caveat) loaded
Music toggle button present and positioned correctly
success_percentage: Frontend: 70% (4/6 pages fully tested, core functionality working but blocked by overlay)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix webpack dev server overlay issue blocking all user interactions. Replace broken audio URL with working source. Test Pages 5-6 (proposal and success) after overlay fix. Verify confetti animation triggers correctly on success page.
